snippet.title: Samurai Unicorn | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Set in the sprawling city of Sydney3, Klo and Unicorn must battle the rising threat of the Dream Eaters, while navigating the corporate bureaucracy of the dangerous Goliath megacorporation.

Independently produced and developed by Its Got Stealth, Samurai Unicorn is an action game that lovingly evokes the PS1-era graphics to create a world that is both instantly nostalgic, but ready to explore contemporary stories.

Wishlist on Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/2494020/Samurai_Unicorn/

Support Samurai Unicorn on Patreon - https://patreon.com/SamuraiUnicorn

Find us at:
Patreon - https://patreon.com/SamuraiUnicorn
Website - https://www.samuraiunicornps1.com/
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/samuni.ps1/ 
Twitter - https://twitter.com/SamUni_PS1
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/SamuraiUnicorn/

Credits:
Produced by Its Got Stealth
Writer/Director - Jordan Turner
Art Direction/Animation - Adam Olds
Additional Modelling - Byron Linturn
Music - Darren Lim
Sound Design - Shaun Clifford (Cheshire Audio)
